name: Out of Time (Fixed)
description:
*This version fixes the resolution problem,  music is better quality and quieter, and it removes some jankiness!

You have been sent from the future with a powerful weapon to stop the war that would end humanity and all that. However, time travel being a fickle beast, you've crash landed in the wrong time. The Jam theme of "Taking Care" reveals itself over the course of the story.
